Fistful_of_Arrows.help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Blazing_Arrow.help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Explosive_Arrow.help: You fire a grenade-tipped arrow at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Stunning_Shot.help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Rain_of_Arrows.help: You unleash a Rain of Arrows on a targeted location, damaging foes within a large area. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Long

Entangling_Arrow.help: Upon impact, the Entangling Arrow releases a strong net that can Immobilize most targets. This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Entangling Arrow can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast
Entangling_Arrow.targetHelp: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Ice_Arrow.help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.targetHelp: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Poison_Gas_Arrow.help: This arrow carries a capsule cloud of poisonous gas, which explodes on impact and weakens all foes in its vicinity. Affected foes damage potential will be severely reduced. Some foes will react badly to the poison and choke for a time. Recharge: Slow

Acid_Arrow.help: This arrow explodes in a small shower of acid on impact. This acid eats through armor, causing damage over time. It reduces the target's Defense as well as his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Acid_Arrow.targetHelp: Your Resistances and Defense have been weakened by the Acid Arrow.
Acid_Arrow.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with an Acid Arrow. The acid is burning you and reducing your damage resistance.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

EMP_Arrow.help: This arrow can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. However, this power uses a lot of Endurance and leaves you unable to recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.shortHelp: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
EMP_Arrow.targetHelp: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Teleport_Arrow.help: Manticore has the ability to teleport an arrow directly to his target.
Teleport_Arrow.targetHelp: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Talon Snap Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Stealth.help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Stealth.targetHelp: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

Teleport.help: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.
Teleport.targetHelp: Manticore has hacked into Paragon Cities Emergency Teleportation system and can use it to travel.

Maneuvers.help: Good leaders are rare. These powers can grant bonuses to your and your teammates.
Maneuvers.shortHelp: PBAoE, Team +DEF(All), +DMG, Res(Taunt, Placate), +ACC, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
